| History                 = Greenpeace is a non-governmental organization dedicated to the protection of the environment.

Greenpeace (as well as college campuses, [[Habitat for Humanity (Earth-616)|Habitat for Humanity]] or the [[Peace Corps (Earth-616)|Peace Corps]]) was also a recruitment source for [[Hydra (Earth-616)|Hydra]] in their rebuilding following the [[Skrull Empire|Skrulls]]' [[Secret Invasion]] and the consequent loss of 15,000 agents and the [[Ichor (Hydra Base)|Ichor base]] by [[Wolfgang von Strucker (Earth-616)|Strucker]] in order to root off the infiltration. Hydra's indoctrination techniques, seemingly more efficient on applicants with a "do-gooder mentality", with almost a total retention rate among the individuals approached among Greenpeace.{{r|Secret Warriors #2}}
